coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: An espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy. It is traditionally composed of equal parts double espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. It is usually topped with a small amount of foam.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte. It is made with espresso, hot milk, and chocolate syrup.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso shot with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, regular drip coffee.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: A sweet dessert consisting of one or more layers. The main, and thickest, layer consists of a mixture of soft, fresh cheese, eggs, and sugar.

desserts.name: Chocolate Brownie
desserts.description: A dense, chocolatey dessert that is often served warm and topped with ice cream or whipped cream.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: A classic pie filled with sliced apples, sugar, and spices, and often served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

desserts.name: Strawberry Shortcake
desserts.description: A sweet dessert made with layers of sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: An Italian dessert consisting of layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and a sweet cream filling, flavored with cocoa.

drinks.name: Iced Tea
drinks.description: A refreshing beverage made by steeping tea leaves in cold water and served chilled.

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: A sweet and tangy drink made from freshly squeezed lemons, sugar, and water.

drinks.name: Smoothie
drinks.description: A blended drink made from a combination of fruits, yogurt, and ice.

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: A rich and creamy chocolate drink often topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water.
